description: Pityriasis Alba is a common skin condition that primarily affects children and young adults. It is characterized by round or oval patches of light-colored, scaly skin that may appear on the face, arms, or other parts of the body.
possible causes: Exact cause is unknown, but it is believed to be related to eczema or dry skin
Genetic predisposition may play a role
symptoms: Round or oval patches of light-colored skin
treatments: Moisturizing creams or lotions to hydrate the skin
